law.catch_line: Sale by or purchase from person other than issuer.
law.text: A person other than the issuer who sells a credit or debit card or a person who buys a credit or debit card from a person other than the issuer is guilty of a Class D felony.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 463, sec. 52, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 6.
